content: cowlicious crochet using a 4 5mm hook and zara by filatura di crosa but really gauge is no issue as long as you can get it around your neck chain 108 stitches any number of stitches less one for foundation chain join in the round with a slip_stitch in the first chain and don t twist the chain round 1 chain 3 stands as first treble then 1 treble into first chain made and continue to 1 treble in each chain in the round skip the slip_stitch join and then 1 slip_stitch in third chain of 3 chain at the beginning of the round round 2 chain 3 1 treble in first treble of previous round and continue 1 treble in each treble to end skip slip_stitch and then 1 slip_stitch in third chain of 3 chain at the beginning of this round continue round 2 until you ve reached the desired length experiment try making it wider and folding it use different gauge yarns use a mix of double and treble_crochet reference the crochet stitch bible betty barnden pattern created by nicole vaughan http //craftapalooza typepad com
